div.div: Wash. & Jeff. Coll. vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: W&J wins the coin toss, defers to the second half.
Ted Ford kickoff 60 yards to the WOO5, Alex Woods return 18 yards to the WOO23 (Benjamin Waugh).
Antonio Bailey rush for 1 yard to the WOO24 (Zach Walker;Jon Turner).
David Smith pass incomplete to Tyson Vogel, dropped pass.
David Smith sacked for loss of 3 yards to the WOO21 (Ryan Torrance).
Trevor Bowden punt 41 yards to the WJC38, Daniel Lis return 33 yards to the WOO29 (Antonio Bailey).
WASH. & JEFF. COLL. drive start at 13:32.
Pete Coughlin pass complete to Eric Scott for 12 yards to the WOO17, 1ST DOWN WJC.

Pete Coughlin pass complete to Ryan Ruffing for 5 yards to the WOO15 (Kevin Komara).
